Q17: The policy requires submission of the following information for review prior to the genetic testing: name of genetic test(s) and/or panel test, the exact gene(s) and/or variants being tested, name of performing laboratory and/or genetic testing organization, relevant billing codes, date of sample collection/blood draw, brief description of how the genetic test results will guide clinical decisions, and clinical documentation by the provider of family history and supporting rationale for the requested test(s).
